column4: well actually that is something i cant wuite figure out.. i am using HDMI for my sound so when i go to audio and select all of the options that i can hear the test sound witheverything seems to be right except i have no volume control that allows me to change anything.. the only way to adjust the volume is from the media player itself.
see if i select pulse audio in my sound prefs.. i get no audio at all
and like right now i am playing a song and if i bring up the pulse audio volume meter it it jumping around but i cant hear anything.
spdif does not have volume control you can try using oss-mixer and enable digital it might work,
